name: Space Escape (neverhour)
description:
Stuck far out in flat-space. Your barely functioning spaceship needs an non-stop supply of parts to keep running. Make your way through the solar system back to Earth and save Sammy the Spaceman from DOOM.

Collect parts in challenging 0-gravity levels filled to the brim with dangerous traps.

DEMO - Escape Neptune, with 5 levels to play.
